article_title: Recap: Live blog of President Obama’s speech at Liberty, Mo. Ford plant
article_text: Obama’s now into a familiar theme: how the U.S. is recovering from the financial crisis. He’s been giving versions of this speech for a few days now. “Five years ago, plants like this were closing their doors,” he says.

article_metadata.article.author: MarketWatch
article_metadata.description: Follow along with MarketWatch's Rob Schroeder as he live-blogs President Barack Obama's speech at a Ford stamping plant in Liberty, Mo.

article_metadata.article.headline: Recap: Live blog of President Obama’s speech at Liberty, Mo. Ford plant

article_summary:
He’s been giving versions of this speech for a few days now.
Obama’s now into a familiar theme: how the U.S. is recovering from the financial crisis.
“Five years ago, plants like this were closing their doors,” he says.
